propDescriptions.children: This prop isn't supported. Use the component prop if you need to change the children structure.
propDescriptions.classes: Override or extend the styles applied to the component. See CSS API below for more details.
propDescriptions.disabled: If true, the accordion is displayed in a disabled state.
propDescriptions.disableFocusRipple: If true, the keyboard focus ripple is disabled.
propDescriptions.disableRipple:
If true, the ripple effect is disabled.
⚠️ Without a ripple there is no styling for :focus-visible by default. Be sure to highlight the element by applying separate styles with the focusVisibleClassName.
propDescriptions.label: The label element.
propDescriptions.sx: Die Einstellung, die das Definieren von Überschreibungen, sowie zusätzlichen CSS-Styles erlaubt. Weitere Details finden Sie auf der `sx` Seite.
propDescriptions.value: You can provide your own value. Otherwise, we fallback to the child position index.
propDescriptions.wrapped: Tab labels appear in a single row. They can use a second line if needed.

root.description: Styles applied to the root element.
